QuestData.Title: To the Fathom-Lord's Call
QuestData.Description: Fathom-Lord Zin'jatar has sent word that the Kvaldir leader has shown himself. I would like you to make your way to him at the far end of the terrace above us, on the middle level of the ruins: Nar'shola Terrace.$B$BKill any Kvaldir that stand in your path on that terrace. We want the echoes of this defeat to ring in their minds so that they will dare not return to threaten our purpose here.$B$BYour devotion does not go unnoticed, my battlemaiden. Go knowing that you have my blessing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 16 Kvaldir on Nar'shola Terrace, the middle level of the ruins.$B$BThis task is part of a Naz'jar Battlemaiden vision. If needed, use the Blade of the Naz'jar Battlemaiden at a time focus to return to the vision.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good of you to join me, Battlemaiden. The echoes of your combat graced your approach. It was a beautiful sound to behold.

Objectives.Objective: Kvaldir invaders on the terrace slain
